definition: to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]

sentences.english: But economic problems at home can also make people feel they have few other choices.
sentences.chinese: 但海內的經濟問題也會使人們感到抉擇餘地未幾。

sentences.english: Your life tomorrow will be the result of your attitudes and the choices you make today.
sentences.chinese: 明日的生活之果，孕育於你今天的態度和抉擇。

sentences.english: The four directions causes that affect Wen Yiduo's politic chosen has been analysed in this text.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了影響聞一多政治抉擇的四方面原因。

sentences.english: At this point, Felicity must make a decision between Ben and Noel.
sentences.chinese: 那時，費必須從本和諾爾之間做出抉擇。

sentences.english: It's really a tough chose if I am Rong.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是容，我也會很難抉擇。

sentences.english: John Tsang should come to a decision that will save the accountability system from becoming a joke again.
sentences.chinese: 曾俊華應該有所抉擇，使問責制不致再次成爲笑話。

sentences.english: I have full confidence in the future of Sino-Australian relations.
sentences.chinese: 我對中澳關係的成長前景佈滿抉擇信念。

sentences.english: No doubt, the media will face this decision again.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，媒體將再次面臨這樣的抉擇。

sentences.english: Kill lost Chen Lianshi Liao Sicheng choices, revenge Yao Lixing.
sentences.chinese: 廖思成抉擇殺失落陳連石，替姚立星報仇。

sentences.english: And then to its position choice, some do, some shirk.
sentences.chinese: 然後再以自己的立場抉擇，有些做，有些推脫。

sentences.english: Bandwidth decides oscillograph measures ability basically to signal.
sentences.chinese: 帶寬抉擇示波器對信號的根基測量能力。

sentences.english: Teams like these were making tough choices all across the earthquake zone.
sentences.chinese: 震區的所有救援隊伍都面臨着艱難的抉擇。

sentences.english: At the very end of the book, Eug ne chooses among the alternatives confronting him.
sentences.chinese: 在書的末尾，尤金在面臨的選擇中作出抉擇。

sentences.english: With a restricted range of foods, if children turn their nose up at one particular foodyouy, you could be stuck for choice.
sentences.chinese: 由於食物嚴格分類，如果孩子們挑食，你便陷於抉擇。

sentences.english: Yet it is one America should take, given the steep road ahead.
sentences.chinese: 然而，考慮到未來路途險阻，這正是美國應作的抉擇。

definition: immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
to sacrifice one's life/to sacrifice (sth valued)/beast slaughtered as a sacrifice
